alert.note: Alert for Butte; Fall River; Haakon; Harding; Jackson; Pennington Co Plains; Southern Foot Hills; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued July 19 at 2:14AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...Mostly sunny skies are expected today with highs in the mid 80s to lower 90s. Minimum afternoon relative humidities will drop to the 20s with some teens over the southwest South Dakota. Northwest winds will average 20-40mph with gusts ranging from 60mph over northwest South Dakota to 35-50mph over southern South Dakota. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Wednesday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the very high category.
